artigos.titulo: Brazilian Real Estate Market in 2026: Complete Analysis
artigos.subtitulo: FIPEZAP data, trends and perspectives for investors
artigos.descricao: With high interest rates, growing delinquency, and a challenging macroeconomic scenario, the Brazilian real estate market is undergoing a transformation. Understand the data, trends, and how to position yourself.

artigos.titulo: Real Estate Auctions in Brazil 2026: The Opportunity of the Decade
artigos.subtitulo: How rising interest rates created a unique window to buy properties at discount
artigos.descricao: Real estate auctions grew 86% in 2024. Understand how it works, types of auctions, risks, and how to take advantage of this opportunity to buy properties with up to 60% discount.

artigos.titulo: Inflation: The Invisible Tax Eroding Your Money
artigos.subtitulo: Why official CPI doesn't reflect real inflation
artigos.descricao: Understand what inflation is, why it exists, and why official CPI doesn't tell the whole truth. Learn how to calculate the real inflation you feel in your wallet.

artigos.subtitulo: End of cycle, historical correction pattern and systemic risks
artigos.descricao: Changed from Bullish to Bearish. End of bull cycle, Strategy risk and zero crypto exposure.

artigos.descricao: Changed from Neutral to Bullish. Historically low prices, protection asset, dollar-denominated returns.

artigos.subtitulo: IPCA+7% is attractive, but fiscal risk is embedded
artigos.descricao: Changed from Bullish to Neutral. Historic rates, but mark-to-market risk if scenario worsens.

artigos.titulo: REITs in 2026: Passive Income with Caution
artigos.subtitulo: Good for income generation, but prices already stretched
artigos.descricao: REIT analysis for 2026. Attractive yields, but market has priced in Selic cuts. Limited upside potential.

artigos.descricao: Complete currency scenario analysis. Dollar fell 11% in 2025, but carry trade, fiscal risk and safe-haven status favor appreciation.
